stories.title: Double Click Button Interaction
stories.description: As a user, I want to double-click the button so that the associated message is displayed.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Double Click Me' button is visible, When I double-click it, Then the message 'You have done a double click' should be displayed.

stories.title: Right Click Button Interaction
stories.description: As a user, I want to right-click the button so that the associated message is displayed.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Right Click Me' button is visible, When I right-click it, Then the message 'You have done a right click' should be displayed.

stories.title: Single Click Button Interaction
stories.description: As a user, I want to click the button so that the associated message is displayed.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Click Me' button is visible, When I click it, Then the message 'You have done a dynamic click' should be displayed.
